title: Remco Evenepoel Calls for Two-Way Radio: ‘Race Communication Should Be Allowed’
content:
Evenepoel calls for reinstatement of race radios at international events in the aftermath of the tragic death of Muriel Furrer at the UCI road cycling world championships.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Calls for Two-Way Radio: ‘Race Communication Should Be Allowed’ on Velo.
author: ahood
